105737.name: Land wealth (% of national income)
105737.datasetName: Wealth as percent national income by wealth type – Piketty (2014)
105737.s_name: Wealth as percent national income by wealth type – Piketty (2014)

source.name: Wealth as percent national income by wealth type – Piketty (2014)
source.dataPublishedBy: Piketty, T., & Goldhammer, A. (2014). Capital in the twenty-first century. Cambridge Massachusetts: The Belknap Press of Harvard University Press.
source.additionalInfo:
National wealth held in different forms, expressed as a percentage of national income at the time.

Taken from Thomas Piketty's book, 'Capital in the 21st Century'. All the data used in the book is made available by Piketty on his website here: http://piketty.pse.ens.fr/files/capital21c/en/
